Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is thickly encrusted with a grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one red-painted Greek character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394470) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394470)
